name: Roll of the Die
description:
Move around by using the arrow keys!

Roll of the Die is a small puzzle game where the goal is to move your die around to activate various floor tiles. Each tile will only activate if the die shows the right number.

Built for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Really it was just an excuse to play around with building a webapp in Rust.

Built using Rust,  Bevy, and trunk.

The source code can be found at https://github.com/brstrutt/Roll-of-the-Die

Enjoy!
